pathAssistantSteps.info:
Great job, a new Lead has been created and is ready to be qualified.


Set the Lead stage to "Qualification" and check the parameters that are required to qualify this Lead in order to move it forward in the Lead process.

Sorry to hear that the Lead is not qualified!


Please state a reason why the Lead was not qualified. You help us analysing Leads that have not been converted!


After you inserted a reason you can Leave the Lead as it is.

Lead Qualification Framework

  • Exploring the "Need"
    • Has the need been identified?
    • Can we cover the need?
    • What are the pain points?
    • What is the timeline?
  • Company Metrics
    • Does the company have liquidity to buy our services?
    • Does the company have the size that fit into our portfolio?â€‹
    • Is there a chance to establish a long term relationship
  • Decision Maker
    • Is the Lead Contact entitled to make a buying decision?
    • Do we have all information we need from the Contact
